scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.clean-start: npm run clean && npm run rc-start
scripts.fresh-install: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn
scripts.fresh-start: npm run fresh-install && npm run rc-start
scripts.build-android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd app/build/outputs/apk/release && open . && cd ../../../../
scripts.clone-health: cd node_modules && rm -rf rn-apple-healthkit && git clone https://github.com/lukaszchopin/rn-apple-healthkit.git && cd ..
scripts.clone-fit: cd node_modules && rm -rf react-native-google-fit && git clone https://github.com/lukaszchopin/react-native-google-fit.git && cd ..
scripts.clone-sport: cd node_modules && rm -rf react-native-sport && git clone https://github.com/lukaszchopin/react-native-sport.git && cd ..
scripts.clone-all: yarn clone-fit && yarn clone-health && yarn clone-sport
